My Henger
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Monster Farm 4 (Spoilers!): Reviews, Information on Gameplay, Etc. : My Henger
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, August 20, 2003 - 09:05 pm:

Well I finally got access to the shrine, so I froze my Garu and decided to shrine the first disc I had shrined in MR3: The Postman. I got a Henger/Henger and it's doing very well.

I was able to win 3 E level tourneys almost straight off CD. I only did a few weeks of drilling, and was able to win the Raspberry Cup, Cactus Tournament, and the White Birch Cup. It wasn't very difficult, just a few hits and I KO'd everyone. (I messed up and re-loaded my game at one point, and re-played a tourney. Totally different monsters were in it, so entrants appear to be random.)

So far, I have seen:
Golem/Golem
Golem/Naga (purple, has a spike coming out of each shoulder)
Tiger/Zuum (green with dark green down the back)
Pixie/Suezo (Vanity has her mirror in battle now)
Pixie/Tiger (blue and white fur)
Suzurin/Ducken (a wooden texture & a big hat like a flattened Ducken head)
Suzurin/Lesione (red, white & blue striped with a lesione head logo on the chest)
Zuum/Plant (head has a huge flower frill around it, back has nasty spikes all the way down)

My henger is pretty much like the MR3 henger, but with more details. It still has the characteristic sound effects, and the laser sword attack it starts with is very effective.
